title: Internship after 4th sem
content: Is there any way to get an internship abroad(US/canada) during the 2 month long summer vacations for tech branches?

comments.body: It's a struggle to get internships within the city itself xD. Most companies don't hire interns from 2nd years. Sometimes a few startups make exceptions but it's pretty rare. Landing an internship in the US is close to impossible.
